programme.title: Robert Mapplethorpe in Cincinnati
programme.short_synopsis: Robert Mapplethorpe's controversial photography exhibition arrives in Cincinnati.
programme.medium_synopsis: The controversy surrounding an exhibition by Robert Mapplethorpe, the conservative nature of Cincinnati, and the work of Judge Wolsey to bring Joyce's Ulysses to the US.
